title: Client Help
body: I was in the middle of a game when the servers went down... now that they're back up I can log in, but after I am logged in I can't do anything but try to connect to the crashed game; which obviously doesn't work. Please help me.

replies.body: It sounds like you were experiencing what we refer to as a *Ghost Game*. These are causing by the game server for your last game not recording the match result properly. Typically these won't last longer than a few hours, so please let me know if you're still having issues with this.

The instability is being felt all over - chat, queues, champ select, in-game, store, Hextech crafting etc. 

I don't advise playing any games or doing anything before the instability is resolved.
